channel.title: Atonement - Your Next Ultimate RSPS Experience!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/iefj4m.jpg[/img]
[url=http://atonement-ps.com/forum/index.php?]Website[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/w564d8aucr9ute9/Atonement.jar]Client Download[/url][/center]
[center][spoiler=What we stand for] Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base focused, predominantly on player vs. monster. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can't wait to initiate this perpetual experience. [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Features] - 24-7 online - No lag - Helpful friendly community - Dedicated Development Team - Double experience once a month and on holidays! - Stable source - Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters to keep you entertained - 20+ Custom bosses with unique locations and drops - Clean, organized, spacious, and easy to maneuver environment - Spacious home area with tons of convenient NPCs/Objects - Fully functional clan chat system - Tons of unique and useful shops - Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching - Unique title system - 25 fully trainable skills - Point systems - Slayer points with shop - PK point system with shop - Level point system with shop - Custom Dungeoneering with shop - Custom Pest Control with point shop - Donation Point System with shop - Vote System with point shop - Tons of helpful commands - Clean tabs with useful information - Working fight caves - Full barrows - Full Warrior's Guild - Clean Website/ Forums - Strong Economy - Milestone level system with shop - Fun-PK - Clean, functional orbs - Daily updates - Growing Community - Oldschool feeling - Summoning - A fully working quest! - 700+ skill tab interface - Functioning Exp Counter - Multiple gameframes to choose from - Trivia system with rewards! - Custom bosses w/ custom zones and drops! - Reasonable drop rates - Challenging skills to convey a sense of accomplishment upon 99 - Fair combat experience rates - And much more! Come check it out for yourself! [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media] Spacious home area with tons of useful objects and NPCs! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/o8th85.png[/img]
700+ fully functional skill interface! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2djnvuq.png[/img]
Unique point shops with awesome items! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/qqb8fc.png[/img]
Custom Dungeoneering with point shop! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/nedyc3.png[/img]
Smooth combat and switching! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/r90dj6.png[/img]
Fully working overloads! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/ivz9zb.png[/img]
Customized Pest Control with point shop! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2dk0rvd.png[/img]
Curses! (Under Construction) [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/5bwra8.png[/img]
Loyalty title system [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/rwuy44.png[/img]
Useful client options [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9hi5pk.png[/img]
Trivia system with rewards! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/307oq9u.png[/img]
Summoning system with winter storage [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2hme9ub.png[/img]
More to come...
[/center]

Fixed, sorry for the inconvenience.

item.title: Atonement - Your Next Ultimate RSPS Experience!
item.dc:creator: @AtonementPS AtonementPS
item.description:
@AtonementPS wrote:

[center]

iefj4m.jpg764×75

Website
Client Download[/center]

[center][spoiler=What we stand for]
Atonement; The next leading innovation in your RSPS experience. We, The Atonement Development Team, strive to emulate a unique and invigorating experience for our whole communal player base focused, predominantly on player vs. monster. Here at Atonement we have included advanced integration among our common entities of website and server. Our Development Team is, and will continue to remain, professional and determined; we listen to your suggestions in recognition that our player base is the server itself. With easily accessible resources both forums, and server sided, Atonement is an enjoyable form of nostalgia from the most tolerable version of Runescape that we all know and love. With daily updates, server advancement is inevitable and necessary to maintain a unique revolutionary RSPS experience. We are excited to see you in-game and can’t wait to initiate this perpetual experience.
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Features]

  • 24-7 online
  • No lag
  • Helpful friendly community
  • Dedicated Development Team
  • Double experience once a month and on holidays!
  • Stable source
  • Many PK locations, minigames, bosses, and monsters to keep you entertained
  • 20+ Custom bosses with unique locations and drops
  • Clean, organized, spacious, and easy to maneuver environment
  • Spacious home area with tons of convenient NPCs/Objects
  • Fully functional clan chat system
  • Tons of unique and useful shops
  • Amazing combat system with correct timers, special attacks, and switching
  • Unique title system
  • 25 fully trainable skills
  • Point systems
  • Slayer points with shop
  • PK point system with shop
  • Level point system with shop
  • Custom Dungeoneering with shop
  • Custom Pest Control with point shop
  • Donation Point System with shop
  • Vote System with point shop
  • Tons of helpful commands
  • Clean tabs with useful information
  • Working fight caves
  • Full barrows
  • Full Warrior’s Guild
  • Clean Website/ Forums
  • Strong Economy
  • Milestone level system with shop
  • Fun-PK
  • Clean, functional orbs
  • Daily updates
  • Growing Community
  • Oldschool feeling
  • Summoning
  • A fully working quest!
  • 700+ skill tab interface
  • Functioning Exp Counter
  • Multiple gameframes to choose from
  • Trivia system with rewards!
  • Custom bosses w/ custom zones and drops!
  • Reasonable drop rates
  • Challenging skills to convey a sense of accomplishment upon 99
  • Fair combat experience rates
  • And much more! Come check it out for yourself!
    [/spoiler]
